# URLSession.ResponseDisposition.becomeStream

**Case**

Convert the response for this request to use a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionStreamTask].

## Declaration

```swift
case becomeStream
```

## Discussion

When used with the completion handler from [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionDataDelegate/urlSession(_:dataTask:didReceive:completionHandler:)], this disposition converts the task to a stream task. This will result in your delegate’s [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionDataDelegate/urlSession(_:dataTask:didBecome:)-7nqzu] being called to provide you with the new stream task that supersedes the current task.

## Task dispositions

- **URLSession.ResponseDisposition.cancel**: Cancel the load.
- **URLSession.ResponseDisposition.allow**: Allow the load operation to continue.
- **URLSession.ResponseDisposition.becomeDownload**: Convert the response for this request to use a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionDownloadTask].
